name: Patagonia Refugio Pack 26L - Women's
description: The size that hits the sweet spot between too much and not enough. Two generous compartments keep your stuff organized when hiking, riding, or hanging out in departure lounges.Main fabric is durable 630-denier nylon with 50% recycled content and a DWR finish to shed light rain.Padded airflow-mesh shoulder straps are sized for womens frames.Top-mounted, reinforced haul handle.Compression straps keep the load close and tight.Daisy chain loops allow you to attach extra gear.Padded computer sleeve holds most 15in. laptops, and is raised off the ground to prevent impacts.Dedicated sleeve holds your tablet.Zippered front stash pocket holds quick-access items.Stretch-woven side pockets carry water bottles.
